description.en: Loimu is the trade union for highly educated professionals and university students in the fields of natural, environmental and forest sciences, as well as agriculture, food and nutrition sciences. How do I get started in my field of work? What skills do I need? Who‚Äôs on my side if something goes wrong? Could I do my thesis for an organization? How much should I ask for as a salary? What if I become unemployed after graduation? At Loimu, we know the answers ‚Äî and we‚Äôre here to help. Join the professional community of your field. Membership includes leisure-time traveller‚Äôs insurance. For first-year students, membership is free until the end of 2026!

description.en: The Finnish Geospatial Research Institute (FGI) is Finland‚Äôs leading center for geospatial and geodetic research. We develop next-generation positioning, mapping, and remote sensing solutions that support businesses, the public sector, and the scientific community. Our research enables accurate maps, reliable satellite positioning services, and trusted information on changes in the Earth and climate.

We provide a comprehensive range of banking and insurance services for private and corporate customers. OP Pohjola employs experts representing various fields, ranging from financial-sector specialists, hard-core developers and agile promoters of change all the way to customer service professionals. We foster our employees' personal growth and career development as specialists. With us, you will be able to build your expertise and develop your strengths in a variety of duties.

description.en: Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world. In Finland, we employ approximately 3,700 IT and business consulting experts in 11 locations. Globally, we have around 93,000 colleagues around the world. We are constantly looking for new additions to our diverse teams! We offer a wide range of development opportunities for both entry-level experienced technology professionals.  Application period for our paid Future Talent Trainee period will open in January. Follow the launch of the trainee application period and check out our other vacancies on our careers page at cgi.fi/ura!

KPMG is one of the world‚Äôs leading expert organizations. Our services include audit, tax and legal, and advisory services. In Finland, KPMG professionals work in 18 different locations. Explore our career opportunities for students and recent graduates here: https://kpmg.com/fi/en/careers/students-graduates.html

description.en: Digia is a company designed for people ‚Äì a workplace where well-being and functionality go hand in hand. We are a software and service company that combines the possibilities of technology with human capabilities to build smarter business, a better society, and a sustainable future. If you're looking for professional growth, knowledgeable colleagues, and a work community that boldly moves forward, explore our career pages!

Reddal offers business development as a service (BDaaS) on a global basis. Working with senior management and front-line staff on issues ranging from strategy, M&A and business building to operational efficiency and financial turnarounds, our mission is to drive growth across companies of all sizes. Our business model is revolutionizing the cost structure of top management professional services, making BDaaS competitive with in-house resources. We bring an analytical, systematic, forward looking, and flexible approach to business development and building. Our client base is global, and we work across multiple industry sectors.

What differentiates us from our competitors from a customer point of view is that we share our knowledge openly with our clients, and do not work with competing companies. With these principles, we set a strong foundation to grow together with our clients and form long-term relationships. Currently, Reddal has offices in Helsinki, Seoul and Kuala Lumpur, and maintains operative locations in Germany and the Middle East.

As a Reddalian, you help building businesses and drive growth of companies of all sizes, across industries, globally. From the first day, you have the opportunity to work alongside executives and front-line staff solving real business problems. Aside close collaboration with our client and exposure to interesting work and industries, we place strong focus on supporting your personal and professional development also through our extensive in-house training program, career mentorship and a low-threshold for support by seniors and peers alike. The strong Reddal community, which is characterized by kindness and openness, is something we are proud of and look forward to welcoming new members to.

ASM is a leading, global supplier of semiconductor wafer processing equipment. Our smart and ambitious team is dedicated to delivering innovative technology solutions to the world‚Äôs leading semiconductor manufacturers. We have over 4,000 talented and skilled employees, based in 15 different hubs worldwide. Together we work to develop thin-film deposition technologies for our customers through epitaxy, ALD, PEALD, vertical furnaces and PECVD. Our goal is to remain an industry leader by being ahead of what‚Äôs next. Focusing on finding collaborative solutions to make integrated circuits, or chips, smaller, faster and even more powerful.

Netlight is an international digital consulting firm, helping leading companies to succeed in the digital landscape, from advice to implementation. Our service contains the collective intelligence of 2000 consultants offering a comprehensive range of digital services, from strategy to technology. We support industries that are facing new challenges and opportunities based on new technology, to make better business. Netlight has been awarded several times for profitable growth and management, as a top employer, and for our engagement in Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion. Located in Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki, Copenhagen, Munich, Hamburg, Berlin, Frankfurt, Zurich, Cologne, Amsterdam, Toronto and London. Co-creating the future today, since 1999.

description.en: Netum is an IT service partner that builds a functional and secure digital society, with over 20 years of experience of demanding IT projects. Our goal is to be the most trusted partner in the industry and the preferred work community in responsible and safe digital transformation. We help our customers develop their digital business by designing and implementing sustainable digital solutions tailored to their needs ‚Äì wisely and responsibly. The Netum Group includes the parent company Netum Group Plc and subsidiaries Netum Ltd, Studyo Oy and Buutti Oy. Netum Ltd offers digital services development and maintenance, cyber security services, data and integration services, development, support, and maintenance of information systems, as well as management consulting. Studyo Oy's software products and services streamline the everyday life of educational institutions and support the development of the quality of education. Buutti Oy offers IT consulting and software development services, in which embedded systems SW and web development are the core of the company's expertise.

description.en: CSC - IT Center for Science is a unique combination of advanced technology, the future of learning and teaching, and the power of networks. CSC is a non-profit state and higher education owned enterprise with a special mission. Our mission is to develop, integrate, and provide high-quality information technology services and ensure that Finland remains at the forefront of development.

description.en: We are a pension company with a human touch. We look after the pensions of more than 1.1 million people and protect the pensions of future generations by investing pension funds profitably, securely, and responsibly. We take care of pension security and pension funds as well as extend careers, so that you can feel confident and optimistic about tomorrow.

EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

At Frends, we are dedicated to redefining the future of integrations and automation. Our mission is to make integrations fast, easy, and transparent. Frends iPaaS is a modern European, low-code integration platform. Frends solves the digitalization challenges of both global and smaller customers and in both private and public sectors in various industries.

description.en: Helsinki Think Company is the University of Helsinki's entrepreneurship community. It brings together students interested in entrepreneurship and provides a platform and tools for independent action. Helsinki Think Company's activities include inspiring events such as entrepreneurship-themed discussions, workshops, and hackathons. Helsinki Think Company welcomes all creators, regardless of their academic age, field of study, or background.

description.en: At GTK, you do meaningful work for Finland, nature and the entire planet. With us, you can work flexibly, influence your own work and develop your competence every day. You are part of a community of the best experts in their field.‚Äã There are more than 400 of us at GTK. Among us, you will find experts with a wide range of backgrounds. Our geo and environmental experts specialise in mineral economy, circular economy, energy, water and environmental issues as well as digital solutions. Top-level laboratory experts, information management experts and research assistants enable our research work. In addition, you will find experts in communications, HR and financial administration, ICT, records management and legal matters. 91% of GTK‚Äôs employees are Finns and the rest are non-Finnish citizens.

description.en: The Helsinki Institute of Physics (HIP) is a national research organization that brings together the expertise of five Finnish universities and STUK. HIP conducts research in theoretical and experimental subatomic physics, collaborates with CERN and other international accelerator laboratories, and contributes to major projects such as the FAIR facility in Germany. The institute offers opportunities for cutting-edge research, international collaboration, and careers in physics.
